description: Teens with moderate screen time and better sleep habits
recommendations: Keep up your healthy digital habits!
Try phone-free dinners with family
Set a consistent bedtime routine
Use your phone's built-in screen time controls
Try a weekly digital detox challenge
sleep_tips: Charge your phone outside the bedroom
Read a book before bed instead of scrolling
Keep consistent sleep and wake times

description: Teens with increased screen time affecting sleep
recommendations: Reduce screen time by 1-2 hours daily
Stop social media use 2 hours before bed
Use app timers for TikTok, Instagram, Snapchat
Create a phone charging station outside bedroom
Find evening activities that don't involve screens
sleep_tips: Set phone to 'Do Not Disturb' at 9 PM
Try relaxing music or podcasts instead of videos
Use blue light filters after sunset

recommendations: Gradually reduce evening social media use
Set specific times for checking social platforms
Use focus modes during work/study time
Replace late-night scrolling with relaxing activities
Monitor your usage with built-in screen time tools
sleep_tips: Aim for 7-8 hours of sleep nightly
Create a wind-down routine without screens
Keep bedroom cool and dark for better sleep

description: Extreme usage patterns requiring immediate intervention
recommendations: Consider a 24-48 hour digital detox
Remove social media apps from phone temporarily
Seek support from friends, family, or counselor
Use app blocking software with strict limits
Establish structured daily routines without devices
sleep_tips: Prioritize sleep as essential for mental health
Use traditional alarm clock, not phone
Create multiple phone-free zones in your home
Consider professional help if sleep problems persist
